Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Kimball/Wabansia
ShortDescription: Northbound 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Kimball, North Ave., Kedzie, Armitage and Kimball: due to, street blockage near Kimball/Wabansia.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Kimball, North Ave., Kedzie, Armitage and Kimball: due to, street blockage near Kimball/Wabansia.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
